languages.text: Осколок К'тан и его беспощадн{mf|ый|ая} и просветленн{mf|ый|ая} провозвестни{mf|к|ца}, что некогда носил{mf||а} имя {name} фон Валанциус, покинули Простор Коронус. Суетная возня короткоживущих рас не интересовала их. Звездный ветер нес их в иные пространства, навстречу свершениям, достойным их мудрости и величия. Эхо оных свершений громом пронесется по вселенной и заставит треснуть кости известного миропорядка.

The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.
languages.original_text: Осколок К'тан и его беспощадн{mf|ый|ая} и просветленн{mf|ый|ая} провозвестни{mf|к|ца}, что некогда носил{mf||а} имя {name} фон Валанциус, покинули Простор Коронус. Суетная возня короткоживущих рас не интересовала их. Звездный ветер нес их в иные пространства, навстречу свершениям, достойным их мудрости и величия. Эхо оных свершений громом пронесется по вселенной и заставит треснуть кости известного миропорядка.

traits.locale_text: C'Tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, which once bore the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. Trivial hustles of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Star wind ushered them to other dimensions, towards deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echo of these deeds will ripple through the universe like a wave of thunder, fracturing the bones of the world as we know it.

C'Tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, which once bore the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. Trivial hustles of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Star wind ushered them to other dimensions, towards deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echo of these deeds will ripple through the universe like a wave of thunder, fracturing the bones of the world as we know it.

The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Expanse. The trivial hustles of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

languages.text: 星神碎片与它无情而睿智的先驱——那个曾叫做{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的生物，离开了科罗努斯扩区。他们对短命物种的琐事漠不关心。恒星之风将他们带到了另一个维度，去做那些与他们的智慧和荣耀相称的事情。这些事迹的回声将在宇宙中回荡，粉碎我们所知存在的根基。
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

traits.locale_text: 星神碎片与它无情而睿智的先驱——那个曾叫做{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的生物，离开了科罗努斯扩区。他们对短命物种的琐事漠不关心。恒星之风将他们带到了另一个维度，去做那些与他们的智慧和荣耀相称的事情。这些事迹的回声将在宇宙中回荡，粉碎我们所知存在的根基。

languages.text: Das C'tan-Fragment und {mf|sein gnadenloser und erleuchteter Bote, der|seine gnadenlose und erleuchtete Botin, die} einst den Namen {name} von Valancius getragen hatte, verließen die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Die trivialen Sorgen kurzlebiger Spezies waren für sie schlicht nicht von Interesse. Sternenwinde trugen sie in andere Dimensionen, zu Taten, die ihrer Weisheit und ihres Glanzes würdig waren. Die Echos dieser Taten werden Wellen im Universum schlagen und die Knochen der Existenz zertrümmern, wie wir sie kennen.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

traits.locale_text: Das C'tan-Fragment und {mf|sein gnadenloser und erleuchteter Bote, der|seine gnadenlose und erleuchtete Botin, die} einst den Namen {name} von Valancius getragen hatte, verließen die Ausdehnung. Die trivialen Sorgen kurzlebiger Spezies waren für sie schlicht nicht von Interesse. Sternenwinde trugen sie in andere Dimensionen, zu Taten, die ihrer Weisheit und ihres Glanzes würdig waren. Die Echos dieser Taten werden Wellen im Universum schlagen und die Knochen der Existenz zertrümmern, wie wir sie kennen.

languages.text: L'Écharde C'tan quitta les Étendues de Koronus avec son émissaire impitoyable et {mf|éclairé|éclairée} qui portait autrefois le nom de {name} von Valancius. Les affaires insignifiantes des créatures aux vies éphémères ne les intéressaient pas. Les vents stellaires les conduisirent dans d'autres dimensions, vers des exploits dignes de leur sagesse et de leur gloire. Les échos de ces hauts faits se propageront dans l'univers en fracturant la structure même de l'existence telle que nous la connaissons.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

traits.locale_text: L'Écharde C'tan quitta les Étendues avec son émissaire impitoyable et {mf|éclairé|éclairée} qui portait autrefois le nom de {name} von Valancius. Les affaires insignifiantes des créatures aux vies éphémères ne les intéressaient pas. Les vents stellaires les conduisirent dans d'autres dimensions, vers des exploits dignes de leur sagesse et de leur gloire. Les échos de ces hauts faits se propageront dans l'univers en fracturant la structure de l'existence telle que nous la connaissons.

languages.text: El fragmento de C'tan y su portador{mf||a} cruel y sabi{mf|o|a}, que una vez se conoció con el nombre de {name} von Valancius, abandonaron la Extensión de Koronus. Los asuntos triviales de las especies efímeras no despertaban el más mínimo interés en ellos. Los vientos estelares los llevaron a otras dimensiones para realizar hazañas dignas de su conocimiento y su gloria. Los ecos de sus actos reverberarán por todo el universo, quebrando los huesos de la existencia tal y como la conocemos.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

traits.locale_text: El fragmento de C'tan y su portador{mf||a} cruel y sabi{mf|o|a}, que una vez se conoció con el nombre de {name} von Valancius, abandonaron la Extensión. Los asuntos triviales de las especies efímeras no despertaban el más mínimo interés en ellos. Los vientos estelares los llevaron a otras dimensiones para realizar hazañas dignas de su conocimiento y su gloria. Los ecos de sus actos reverberarán por todo el universo, quebrando los huesos de la existencia tal y como la conocemos.

languages.text: かつて{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスの名を冠したク＝タン・シャードとその無慈悲で啓蒙的な使者は、コロヌス・エクスパンスを去った。短命な種族の些細な心配など、彼らにとって興味はなかった。星風は彼らを異次元へと運び、彼らの知恵と栄光にふさわしい行為へと導いた。これらの行いの反響は宇宙全体に波及し、我々が知っている存在の骨を砕くだろう。
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

traits.locale_text: かつて{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスの名を冠したク＝タン・シャードとその無慈悲で啓蒙的な使者は、エクスパンスを去った。短命な種族の些細な喧騒など、彼らにとって興味はなかった。星風は彼らを異次元へと運び、彼らの知恵と栄光にふさわしい行為へと導いた。これらの行いの反響は宇宙全体に波及し、我々が知っている存在の骨を砕くだろう。

languages.text: C'tan Parçası ve onun bir zamanlar {name} von Valancius ismini taşıyan acımasız ve aydın müjdecisi, Koronus Enginliği'ni terk etti. Kısa ömürlü türlerin önemsiz meseleleri onları ilgilendirmiyordu. Yıldız rüzgârları onları farklı boyutlara, irfanlarına ve şanlarına yakışan eylemlere sürükledi. Bu eylemlerin yankıları tüm evrene etki edecek ve bildiğimiz anlamdaki varoluşu temellerinden sarsacaktır.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard and its merciless and enlightened harbinger, once bearing the name of {name} von Valancius, left the Koronus Expanse. The trivial concerns of short-lived species were of no interest to them. Stellar winds carried them to other dimensions, toward deeds befitting their wisdom and glory. The echoes of these deeds will ripple through the universe, fracturing the bones of existence as we know it.

traits.locale_text: C'tan Parçası ve onun bir zamanlar {name} von Valancius ismini taşıyan acımasız ve aydın müjdecisi, Koronus Enginliği'ni terk etti.
